Choose 'Rest' on bed to get started. Build workshop custom storage quick-dress to change outfit, or build an intimate bed with storage for sleep outfit.
Skill based on charisma, health (addictions and disease), perks, and intimacy experience (number of intimate scenes).
What is intimate attempt chance based on as shown in prompt?

3 factors shown on prompt: Sex Appeal, time-since, and location score. Plus hidden bonuses which include special items, party drugs, or bonus help to get started. Time-since less than day is generally negative and increasingly positive after 24 hours until maximum at around 10 days. Location score includes bonus from special bed (Vault bed, double-bed, or intimate bed), bed ownership (yours or companion's), weather, season, hour of day, and nearby awake NPCs.

content.text: Camera after bed stays low or in wrong position

Try toggle 1st/3rd-person view. If using another custom camera disable this custom camera in the MCM. When sleeping loading a save-game may cause camera to become stuck. Exit to main menu and load save again.

The 'Rest' will hide when in Power Armor, weapon drawn, sneaking, over-encumbered, or if bed marked incompatible by the mod. If only 'Sleep' may have another mod altering bed activation. If instead of 'Sleep' states, 'Awaken' then sneak or try activate bed to reset.
Sneak to regain controls. Beds require enough space on the sides and above for character to enter and exit. Avoid blue tarp-tent and other beds with low hanging obstructions.
Rest: after exit bed failed to redress, companion stuck in bed, or bed still has 'Awaken'
Sneak to redress. May have accidentally activated a nearby furniture. Remember to activate same bed sleeping in to exit.
Plenty of open beds nearby, but companion can't find bed! Companion ignores beds assigned to others, or custom bed not recognized. Send companion to sleep.
Rest: companion remains dressed for bed

Only romanced companion (not Extra NPCs) will undress for bed to the same level as player character, and only if in bed or finds a bed nearby. Instruct companion to use bed to make sure bed is found. Some items, like hats, may fail to remove. For these items use the Trade menu to remove and re-equip to get system to recognize.
Rest: companion refuses to equip sleep clothes

Full-body outfit works best. Sleepwear must be bathrobe, recognized custom sleepwear, or marked as sleep clothes using the holotape. If player can wear, equip it and open Sleep Clothes Menu. At the top the banner should mention if wearing sleep clothes. If not, mark it.

Test companion: in Trade menu, equip then remove sleep item so companion back in normal outfit. In holotape, enable Test Mode (Settings Menu) then in Test Menu, select Undress lover for bed, and exit holotape. If companion undressed, but not wearing sleep outfit then use Trade Menu to equip. Return to holotape Test Menu and select Redress lover.
Intimacy: No prompt - have companion, but go straight to sleep

Must be romanced or companion idolizes you. Make sure companion is nearby and standing, but the Intimate Lover Ring accepts seated companion. Optional non-romance companions (Extra NPCs) require having perk. Custom companion with custom follow system may not be compatible. Try equip Intimate Lover Ring and then try in Test Mode. May disable Test Mode after ring equipped.

Until gaining more experience limit attempts to once each night to maximize starter bonus. Choose private areas like rented bed or Home Plate. Upgrade settlement by building twin-beds or double-bed. Try to get Sex Appeal up to 30+ using bathrobe or drugs. Liquor helps with low charisma, but may be a negative for highly charismatic character.
